sentences.english: The Lord stretched out His arms, and I saw His nail-pierced hands.
sentences.chinese: 主伸出他的臂膀，我看到他那钉痕的双手。

sentences.english: And now click on the two branches to give the snowman arms.
sentences.chinese: 接着现在按一下这两个树杈给雪人臂膀。

sentences.english: Civilized etiquette of our study is a foundation, is the healthy growth of our arms.
sentences.chinese: 文明礼仪是我们学习的根基，是我们健康成长的臂膀。

sentences.english: Scarlet dropped her head on her arms and struggled not to cry.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉将头伏在臂膀上，竭力忍住了哭。

sentences.english: Revolutions have a terrible arm and a happy hand, they strike firmly and choose well.
sentences.chinese: 革命有猛烈的臂膀和灵巧的手，打得坚定，选得好。

sentences.english: Your arms full, and your hair wet. I could not.
sentences.chinese: 你的臂膀抱满，你的头发湿漉，我说不出。

sentences.english: I have your arms around me wooh like fire.
sentences.chinese: 我有你的臂膀环绕着，奥，象炉火一样温暖。

sentences.english: Yes, they all come to meet me, arms a-reaching, smiling sweetly.
sentences.chinese: 是的，他们都来接我，张开著臂膀，甜蜜的笑著。

sentences.english: Compact arms with bulging triceps hung at its side.
sentences.chinese: 它身体两侧是有着紧胀三头肌的结实臂膀。

sentences.english: The prone shadows with their out-stretched arms clung to the feet of the hurrying light.
sentences.chinese: 倾斜的影子伸出臂膀，拖住时光匆匆的脚步。

sentences.english: Instead of cowering away from it, welcome it with open arms.
sentences.chinese: 与其颤抖着远离它，不如敞开臂膀欢迎它。

sentences.english: What magic has snared you in these slender arms of mine?
sentences.chinese: 是什么魔力把妳送到我瘦小的臂膀里？

sentences.english: Remembering the lieutenant's arms around him, he wept again.
sentences.chinese: 回忆起中尉用他的臂膀抱着他时，他又开始老泪纵横。

sentences.english: Along the Nile River, the autumn sun glowed especially softly and date palm trees stretched arms enthusiastically.
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河畔的秋阳格外柔媚，椰枣树热情地舒展着臂膀。

sentences.english: Pump your arms to increase your calorie-burning power.
sentences.chinese: 挥动你的臂膀来增加能量的燃烧。

sentences.english: Buried in her arms, awakened by her kisses.
sentences.chinese: “埋在她的臂膀里，因她的亲吻而苏醒”。

definition: to hold in one's arms/to embrace
